
# 🎉 Get Perplexity Pro FREE for 12 Months — Airtel Users Only! 🇮🇳

Airtel is offering **1 year of Perplexity Pro** (worth ₹16,000+) absolutely **FREE**!

<div style="text-align: center; margin: 20px 0;">
  <img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/inulute/perplexity-ai-app@refs/heads/main/notifications/images/ntf2.jpg" alt="Perplexity Pro Offer – Airtel Users" style="max-width: 220px; height: auto; border-radius: 8px;" />
</div>

---

## 👥 Who Can Claim?

Available for all:
- **Prepaid** users  
- **Postpaid** users  
- **Airtel Xstream Fiber (Wi-Fi)** users  

---

## 📲 How to Activate

1. Open the **Airtel Thanks** app  
2. Go to the **Rewards** section  
3. Look for the **Perplexity Pro** offer  
4. **Tap to redeem** instantly  

That’s it — enjoy full access!

---

## 🚀 What’s Included

- Use **GPT-4o**, **Claude 3**, and other cutting-edge AI models  
- **Unlimited pro searches**, file uploads, and image generation  
- **Priority support**, deep research tools, and more  

---

## ⚠️ Hurry Up!

This is a **limited-time offer** — no official deadline announced.  
**Claim it before it’s gone!**

---
